Record.ClassificationPath: Nervous System Diseases/Central Nervous System Diseases/Spinal Cord Diseases/Spinal Cord Compression
Disorders of Environmental Origin/Wounds and Injuries/Spinal Cord Injuries/Spinal Cord Compression
Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Cancer-Related Condition/Spinal Cord Compression
Record.Description: Acute and chronic conditions characterized by external mechanical compression of the SPINAL CORD due to extramedullary neoplasm; EPIDURAL ABSCESS; SPINAL FRACTURES; bony deformities of the vertebral bodies; and other conditions. Clinical manifestations vary with the anatomic site of the lesion and may include localized pain, weakness, sensory loss, incontinence, and impotence.
